installation.script:
apt update
apt install -y wget

cd /mnt/server

wget -O gitea https://dl.gitea.io/gitea/main/gitea-main-linux-amd64
chmod +x gitea

mkdir custom

echo "[server]
LOCAL_ROOT_URL = http://localhost:${SERVER_PORT}/
DOMAIN           = ${SERVER_IP}
HTTP_PORT        = ${SERVER_PORT}
DISABLE_SSH      = ${DISABLE_SSH}
SSH_PORT         = ${SSH_PORT}" > /mnt/server/custom/app.ini

echo "Install complete"
